description_for_human: Find and compare 500+ developer tools. Get AI-powered tech stack recommendations for your projects.
description_for_model: VibeBuff is a comprehensive developer tools database with 500+ tools across categories like frontend frameworks, backend services, databases, authentication, hosting, and more. Use this plugin to: 1) Search for developer tools by name or category, 2) Get detailed information about specific tools including pros, cons, pricing, and features, 3) Compare multiple tools side-by-side, 4) Get AI-powered tech stack recommendations based on project type (SaaS, e-commerce, API, mobile app, etc.), budget constraints, and team size. The plugin provides real community insights and ratings from thousands of developers.
